howItWorks.title: 7 Simple Steps to Supply Chain Success
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple Process
howItWorks.description: Our streamlined process makes sourcing and shipping from Turkey effortless.

step1.title: Find Your Suppliers
step1.description: Find your suppliers, get your proforma invoices and send them all to our team for review and processing.

step2.title: Supplier Verification
step2.description: Our team will verify your suppliers and after confirmation we will sign a master contract to act on your behalf.

step3.title: Payment Processing
step3.description: We will handle all your order payments on behalf of you from your account balance with complete transparency.

step4.title: Order Consolidation
step4.description: Our team will receive and verify all your orders, then combine them into a single optimized shipment.

step5.title: Documentation Simplified
step5.description: We handle all export paperwork, customs forms, and create a single bill of lading for your consolidated shipment.

step6.title: Global Shipping
step6.description: Your consolidated order is shipped to your destination with real-time tracking and updates.

step7.title: Easy Delivery
step7.description: Receive your multiple orders as a single shipment, saving time and reducing customs complexity.
